version_description:
English daily challenge added.
We have added fall them.
Implemented bug fixes and improve performance.

2020 Holiday update
- Several reported bug fixes
- Winter theme

- Fix shop purchase validate
- Fix some minor issues
- In this version, the User experience has been improved and the problems that were reported by you have been fixed. Thank You for being with World of Words: KALAMATIC!

Thank You for being with World of Words: KALAMATIC!

Changes In this version:

- Added 200 more levels
- The user interface has been improved
- Rewarded Videos has been improved
- Daily Challenge has been improved
- Reported issues had been fixed
